text: Given below are two premises P1 and P2. Four conclusions are drawn from them. Which of the following conclusion(s) is/are valid? (Taking premises individually or jointly). Premises: P1: Most of the players are physically fit. P2: Most of the coaches are players. Which of the following Conclusions is/are valid? (a) Most of the coaches are physically fit. (b) Most of the players are coaches. (c) Most of the physically fit persons are players. (d) Most of the physically fit persons are coaches.
